rules.description: vim preview: map JK (previous / next page)
vim-preview: map gG (go to first / last page)
vim-preview: map cmd-b to toggle toc

manipulators.description: shift + option + h = mouse left fast
shift + control + h = mouse wheel left
shift + command + h = mouse wheel left fast
shift + option + j = mouse down fast
shift + control + j = mouse wheel down
shift + command + j = mouse wheel down fast
shift + option + k = mouse up fast
shift + control + k = mouse wheel up
shift + command + k = mouse wheel up fast
shift + option + l = mouse move right fast
shift + control + l = mouse wheel right
shift + command + l = mouse wheel right fast

rules.description: capslock - hyper quick interact with screen
